song_name: Hudson's Adventure Island NES - Area 1 Round 3
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Hudson's Adventure Island NES - Area 1 Round 3 is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Hudson's Adventure Island NES - Area 1 Round 3 is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
